author: Taylor Locke
title: Why Mark Cuban gave this entrepreneur an extra $50,000 (for free) on 'Shark Tank'
description: After working a corporate job with minimal exposure to the sun, Amber Leong was inspired to start a light-therapy lamp business, which includes a line of lamps that mimic sunlight for workers' desks indoors. Leong pitched her company, Circadian Optics, on "Sh…
content:
After working a corporate job with minimal exposure to the sun, Amber Leong was inspired to start a light-therapy lamp business, which includes a line of lamps that mimic sunlight forworkers' desks indoors.
